text:
Hi again :wave::skin-tone-2: 

So decided to beak down each section of the design into 3, with the 3 puzzles left, now I have this
I tried adding the little puzzle circles round them, but it's been unresponsive.
Any idea how I can move on from here?
I would use a absolutely positioned element for the puzzle circles. Then respoition them on mobile when you want the items to be in vertical column.

I finally did it!!!
Thank you so much! :relaxed:
Can you add a snippet of your code?
